Barium (Ba): 48 g

 Magnesium: Available at hardware stores or online as magnesium powder. 
 Palladium: Obtain from a specialized metal supplier or online precious metal dealer. 
 Technetium: Source from a nuclear materials supplier, handling precautions required.
